PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-11502013-11-07,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 5
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, no. 5 in order to (1) formalize and give legal effect to Prince Edward Island's decision to adopt the HST; and (2) make necessary housekeeping and technical amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0197 Publication Date: 2013-11-20
AttachmentsAttachment
